The restauration [sic]. Or, A poem on the return of the most mighty and ever glorious Prince, Charles the II. to his kingdoms. By Arthur Brett of Christs-Church Oxon. Brett, Arthur, d. 1677?
[2], 25, [1] p.
printed by J.H. for Samuel Thomson at the Bishops-head in St. Pauls Church-yard, London : 1660.
In verse. Annotation on Thomason copy: "June 5". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
